item.title: Project 3: NASHVILLE HOUSING
item.description: DATA CLEANING IN SQL QUERIES Standadized date format Populate “Property Address” data Breaking out “Address” into Individual columns (Address, City, State) Change “Y” and “N” to “Yes” and “No” in “Sold As Vacant” data Remove Duplicates Delete unused columns Link to Github repository
